sentence: Ms. Barnette has the backing of State Senator Doug Mastriano, who has been the front-runner in the Republican primary for governor, and she has run an unabashedly hard-right campaign, attacking her better-funded rivals as globalists? on the debate stage and questioning their commitment to gun rights and the anti-abortion movement.
title: 4 takeaways from Tuesdays primaries in Nebraska and West Virginia.

sentence: Likewise, in the state's GOP gubernatorial primary, Republican Doug Mastriano, who advocated for the 2020 presidential election results to be overturned, appears to be the favorite to clinch the nomination to take on Democrat Josh Shapiro in November.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Five things to watch in North Carolina, Pennsylvania primaries

sentence: Politico: Dem-allied groups drop an A-bomb on state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) to start Pennsylvania governors race.
